name: Red Fort
description: A magnificent 17th-century Mughal fort built with red sandstone. UNESCO World Heritage Site showcasing Mughal architecture, museums, and the iconic Lahori Gate. Perfect for history enthusiasts and photography.

name: India Gate
description: Iconic war memorial arch dedicated to Indian soldiers. Beautiful lawns perfect for evening strolls, picnics, and photography. Illuminated beautifully at night. Free entry, great for families.

name: Qutub Minar
description: World's tallest brick minaret, 73 meters high. UNESCO World Heritage Site with ancient ruins, intricate carvings, and beautiful gardens. Best visited in morning for photography.

name: Lotus Temple
description: Stunning Bahá'í House of Worship shaped like a lotus flower. Peaceful meditation space, beautiful architecture, and serene gardens. Free entry, no photography inside.

name: Akshardham Temple
description: Magnificent Hindu temple complex with stunning architecture, boat ride, light show, and exhibitions. One of the largest temple complexes in India. Photography not allowed inside.
location: Noida Mor, Pandav Nagar, East Delhi

name: Humayun's Tomb
description: Beautiful Mughal mausoleum with Persian-style gardens. Inspiration for Taj Mahal, UNESCO World Heritage Site. Perfect for history lovers and peaceful walks.

name: Lodhi Gardens
description: Beautiful 90-acre park with ancient tombs, jogging tracks, and lush greenery. Perfect for morning walks, picnics, and bird watching. Free entry, peaceful atmosphere.

name: Connaught Place
description: Historic circular shopping and business district. Modern malls, restaurants, cafes, and street shopping. Great for shopping, dining, and experiencing Delhi's urban culture.

name: Dilli Haat
description: Open-air food and craft bazaar showcasing handicrafts from all Indian states. Authentic street food, traditional items, and cultural performances. Perfect for souvenirs and local cuisine.

name: Chandni Chowk
description: Historic bustling market in Old Delhi. Narrow lanes filled with spices, textiles, jewelry, street food, and traditional items. Experience authentic Delhi culture, famous parathas, and jalebis.

name: Baga Beach
description: Famous beach known for water sports, vibrant shacks, and nightlife. Perfect for parasailing, jet-skiing, and sunset views. Popular among tourists and locals alike.

name: Basilica of Bom Jesus
description: UNESCO World Heritage Site housing the mortal remains of St. Francis Xavier. Baroque architecture showcasing Portuguese influence. A must-visit for history enthusiasts.

name: Fort Aguada
description: 17th-century Portuguese fort offering panoramic views of Arabian Sea. Well-preserved lighthouse and bastions. Perfect for sunset views and photography.

name: Calangute Beach
description: Queen of Beaches with golden sands and clear waters. Popular for water sports, beach shacks, and shopping. Lively atmosphere with numerous restaurants and cafes.

name: Dudhsagar Falls
description: Magnificent four-tiered waterfall cascading from 310 meters. Surrounded by lush greenery, perfect for nature lovers and photography. Best visited during monsoon season.

name: Anjuna Flea Market
description: Vibrant weekly market offering handicrafts, jewelry, clothes, and souvenirs. Famous for its bohemian vibe, live music, and eclectic finds. Perfect for unique souvenirs.

name: Se Cathedral
description: Largest church in Asia, built in Portuguese-Gothic style. Houses the Golden Bell and beautiful altars. A significant historical and religious monument in Old Goa.

name: Palolem Beach
description: Serene crescent-shaped beach with calm waters. Perfect for swimming, kayaking, and dolphin watching. Less crowded, ideal for peaceful relaxation.

name: Spice Plantation
description: Guided tours through aromatic spice gardens. Learn about cardamom, pepper, vanilla, and other spices. Includes traditional Goan lunch and cultural shows.

name: Mapusa Market
description: Traditional Goan market selling fresh produce, spices, textiles, and local handicrafts. Experience authentic Goan culture and shop for souvenirs at reasonable prices.

name: Gateway of India
description: Iconic arch monument overlooking the Arabian Sea. Built to commemorate the visit of King George V. Perfect for photography and boat rides to Elephanta Island.

name: Marine Drive
description: Beautiful 3.6 km promenade along the Arabian Sea. Perfect for evening walks, jogging, and watching sunsets. Illuminated beautifully at night, creating a Queen's Necklace effect.

name: Elephanta Caves
description: UNESCO World Heritage Site with ancient rock-cut cave temples dedicated to Lord Shiva. Intricate sculptures and carvings dating back to 5th-8th century. Accessible by ferry from Gateway of India.

name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus
description: UNESCO World Heritage Site showcasing Victorian Gothic architecture. One of the busiest railway stations in India. Beautiful blend of Indian and British architectural styles.

name: Juhu Beach
description: Popular beach known for street food, especially pav bhaji and bhel puri. Perfect for evening strolls, watching sunsets, and enjoying local snacks. Lively atmosphere with numerous food stalls.

name: Colaba Causeway
description: Famous shopping street with trendy boutiques, street vendors, and restaurants. Perfect for buying souvenirs, clothes, and accessories. Great place to experience Mumbai's street culture.

name: Haji Ali Dargah
description: Famous mosque and dargah located on an islet in the Arabian Sea. Connected by a causeway, accessible during low tide. Beautiful architecture and spiritual atmosphere.

name: Sanjay Gandhi National Park
description: Large protected area with diverse flora and fauna. Home to Kanheri Caves, ancient Buddhist rock-cut monuments. Perfect for nature walks, wildlife spotting, and history enthusiasts.

name: Crawford Market
description: Historic market selling fresh fruits, vegetables, spices, and household items. Beautiful Victorian architecture. Great place to experience local shopping culture and buy souvenirs.

name: Bandra-Worli Sea Link
description: Iconic cable-stayed bridge connecting Bandra and Worli. Architectural marvel offering stunning views of the Arabian Sea. Perfect for photography and evening drives.

name: Alleppey Backwaters
description: Serene network of canals, lakes, and lagoons. Experience traditional houseboat stays, witness rural Kerala life, and enjoy breathtaking sunsets. Perfect for relaxation and nature photography.

name: Munnar Tea Gardens
description: Rolling hills covered with lush tea plantations. Visit tea museums, enjoy scenic views, and learn about tea processing. Perfect for nature lovers and photography enthusiasts.

name: Fort Kochi
description: Historic area with colonial architecture, Chinese fishing nets, and art galleries. Blend of Portuguese, Dutch, and British influences. Perfect for heritage walks and cultural exploration.

name: Chinese Fishing Nets
description: Iconic cantilevered fishing nets introduced by Chinese traders. Beautiful sight especially during sunset. Watch local fishermen operate these traditional nets along the waterfront.

name: Periyar Wildlife Sanctuary
description: Famous tiger reserve and national park with diverse wildlife. Enjoy boat rides on Periyar Lake, jungle safaris, and nature walks. Home to elephants, tigers, and various bird species.

name: Kumarakom Bird Sanctuary
description: Beautiful bird sanctuary on the banks of Vembanad Lake. Home to migratory birds, especially during winter. Perfect for bird watching, photography, and peaceful boat rides.

name: Varkala Beach
description: Scenic cliff-top beach with natural springs. Perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and watching sunsets. Less crowded than other beaches, ideal for relaxation.

name: Mattancherry Palace
description: Portuguese palace showcasing Kerala murals and royal artifacts. Beautiful architecture and historical significance. Also known as Dutch Palace, reflecting colonial influences.

name: Spice Market
description: Vibrant market selling fresh spices, tea, coffee, and traditional Kerala products. Experience the aromatic world of Kerala spices and buy authentic products at reasonable prices.

name: Athirapally Falls
description: Magnificent waterfall cascading from 80 feet height. Surrounded by lush forests, perfect for nature photography and trekking. Featured in many Indian films.

name: City Palace
description: Magnificent palace complex overlooking Lake Pichola. Blend of Rajasthani and Mughal architecture. Beautiful courtyards, museums, and panoramic views of the city and lakes.

name: Lake Pichola
description: Beautiful artificial lake with scenic boat rides. Offers stunning views of City Palace and surrounding hills. Perfect for sunset cruises and photography.

name: Jag Mandir
description: Beautiful island palace in Lake Pichola. Accessible by boat, offers stunning architecture and lake views. Perfect for photography and peaceful walks.

name: Fateh Sagar Lake
description: Picturesque lake with three islands. Perfect for boating, evening strolls, and watching sunsets. Less crowded than Lake Pichola, ideal for peaceful relaxation.

name: Saheliyon ki Bari
description: Beautiful garden built for royal ladies. Features fountains, marble elephants, and lush greenery. Perfect for peaceful walks and photography.

name: Sajjangarh Fort
description: Monsoon Palace perched on a hilltop. Offers panoramic views of Udaipur city and surrounding lakes. Perfect for sunset views and photography.

name: Hathi Pol Bazaar
description: Traditional market selling handicrafts, textiles, jewelry, and souvenirs. Perfect for buying Rajasthani items like puppets, miniatures, and traditional clothes.

name: Bagore ki Haveli
description: Historic mansion showcasing Rajasthani culture and architecture. Features museums, cultural shows, and traditional artifacts. Evening cultural performances are a highlight.

name: Jagdish Temple
description: Beautiful Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Vishnu. Intricate carvings and architecture. Located near City Palace, perfect for spiritual visits and photography.

name: Shilpgram
description: Rural arts and crafts complex showcasing traditional village life. Features handicrafts, cultural performances, and authentic Rajasthani architecture. Perfect for cultural immersion.

name: Charminar
description: Iconic 16th-century monument and mosque with four minarets. Symbol of Hyderabad, surrounded by bustling markets. Perfect for photography and experiencing old city culture.

name: Golconda Fort
description: Massive 16th-century fort with impressive acoustics and panoramic city views. Rich history, beautiful architecture, and sound and light shows in the evening.

name: Hussain Sagar Lake
description: Large artificial lake with Buddha statue in the center. Perfect for boating, evening walks, and watching sunsets. Beautiful promenade and parks around the lake.

name: Chowmahalla Palace
description: Former residence of Nizams showcasing opulent architecture and royal artifacts. Beautiful courtyards, grand halls, and vintage car collection. Perfect for history enthusiasts.

name: Ramoji Film City
description: World's largest integrated film city. Studio tours, theme park rides, and behind-the-scenes experiences. Perfect for Bollywood enthusiasts and family entertainment.

name: Salar Jung Museum
description: One of India's largest museums with rare art collections, antiques, and artifacts from around the world. Features the famous Veiled Rebecca statue and clock collection.

name: Laad Bazaar
description: Famous market near Charminar selling bangles, pearls, traditional clothes, and souvenirs. Perfect for buying authentic Hyderabadi items and experiencing local shopping culture.

name: Birla Mandir
description: Beautiful white marble temple dedicated to Lord Venkateswara. Perched on a hilltop, offers panoramic city views. Perfect for spiritual visits and photography.

name: Qutb Shahi Tombs
description: Historic tombs of Qutb Shahi dynasty rulers. Beautiful Persian architecture with intricate carvings. Peaceful gardens perfect for history enthusiasts and photography.

name: Mecca Masjid
description: One of the oldest and largest mosques in India. Built with bricks from Mecca, can accommodate thousands of worshippers. Beautiful architecture and spiritual atmosphere.

name: Victoria Memorial
description: Magnificent white marble museum dedicated to Queen Victoria. Beautiful architecture, lush gardens, and extensive art collection. Perfect for history lovers and photography.

name: Howrah Bridge
description: Iconic cantilever bridge over Hooghly River. One of Kolkata's most recognizable landmarks. Perfect for photography, especially during sunset and evening illumination.

name: Dakshineswar Kali Temple
description: Famous temple dedicated to Goddess Kali on the banks of Hooghly River. Associated with Ramakrishna Paramahamsa. Beautiful architecture and spiritual atmosphere.

name: Park Street
description: Famous street known for restaurants, cafes, and nightlife. Perfect for dining, shopping, and experiencing Kolkata's vibrant culture. Especially lively during Christmas and New Year.

name: Indian Museum
description: Oldest and largest museum in India. Houses extensive collections of art, archaeology, and natural history. Perfect for history and culture enthusiasts.

name: College Street
description: Famous book market with hundreds of bookstores. Paradise for book lovers, offers rare and second-hand books at great prices. Perfect for browsing and buying books.

name: Kumartuli
description: Traditional potters' quarter famous for Durga Puja idol making. Witness artisans creating beautiful clay idols. Perfect for cultural immersion and photography.

name: Eden Gardens
description: Historic cricket stadium and beautiful park. One of the largest cricket stadiums in the world. Perfect for sports enthusiasts and peaceful walks in the gardens.

name: New Market
description: Historic market selling everything from clothes to electronics. Perfect for shopping, street food, and experiencing Kolkata's vibrant market culture.

name: St. Paul's Cathedral
description: Beautiful Anglican cathedral with Gothic architecture. Peaceful atmosphere, beautiful stained glass windows, and serene gardens. Perfect for quiet reflection and photography.

name: Tiger Hill
description: Famous viewpoint for stunning sunrise over Kanchenjunga and Mount Everest. Early morning trek offers breathtaking panoramic views of snow-capped peaks.

name: Darjeeling Himalayan Railway
description: UNESCO World Heritage toy train offering scenic rides through tea gardens and mountains. Nostalgic experience with beautiful views of the Himalayas.

name: Tea Gardens
description: Lush tea plantations offering guided tours and tea tasting. Learn about tea processing, enjoy scenic views, and buy premium Darjeeling tea.

name: Peace Pagoda
description: Beautiful Buddhist pagoda offering peace and tranquility. Stunning architecture with panoramic views of Darjeeling and surrounding mountains.

name: Mall Road
description: Main shopping street with local handicrafts, woolen items, and souvenirs. Perfect for buying tea, traditional items, and enjoying local food.

name: Batasia Loop
description: Spiral railway loop with war memorial and beautiful gardens. Offers stunning views of mountains and the toy train passing through the loop.

name: Observatory Hill
description: Sacred hill with ancient temples and panoramic mountain views. Perfect for sunrise views, spiritual visits, and photography.

name: Himalayan Mountaineering Institute
description: Famous mountaineering institute with museum showcasing mountaineering history and equipment. Learn about Everest expeditions and mountaineering techniques.

name: Padmaja Naidu Himalayan Zoological Park
description: High-altitude zoo specializing in Himalayan fauna including red pandas, snow leopards, and Tibetan wolves. Beautiful setting with mountain views.

name: Rock Garden
description: Beautiful terraced garden with waterfalls, rock formations, and colorful flowers. Perfect for peaceful walks and photography amidst natural beauty.

name: Hadimba Devi Temple
description: Ancient temple dedicated to Goddess Hadimba surrounded by cedar forest. Beautiful architecture with intricate wood carvings. Perfect for spiritual visits and photography.

name: Solang Valley
description: Adventure hub offering paragliding, skiing, zorbing, and ropeway rides. Stunning mountain views and snow activities during winter. Perfect for adventure enthusiasts.

name: Mall Road
description: Main shopping street with local handicrafts, woolen items, and souvenirs. Perfect for buying traditional Himachali items and enjoying local cuisine.

name: Vashisht Hot Springs
description: Natural hot water springs with ancient temple. Believed to have medicinal properties. Perfect for relaxation and spiritual visits.

name: Rohtang Pass
description: High mountain pass offering stunning views of snow-capped peaks. Popular for snow activities, photography, and scenic drives. Requires permits during peak season.

name: Manu Temple
description: Ancient temple dedicated to Sage Manu, believed to be the creator of human race. Beautiful architecture and peaceful atmosphere in Old Manali.

name: Beas River
description: Beautiful river flowing through Manali. Perfect for riverside walks, photography, and adventure activities like river rafting. Scenic views of surrounding mountains.

name: Naggar Castle
description: Historic castle with beautiful architecture and panoramic views. Houses art gallery and offers stunning views of Kullu Valley. Perfect for history and photography enthusiasts.

name: Jogini Falls
description: Beautiful waterfall accessible via scenic trek. Perfect for nature lovers, photography, and peaceful relaxation. Less crowded than other tourist spots.

name: Tibetan Monastery
description: Peaceful monastery with beautiful architecture and spiritual atmosphere. Features prayer wheels, Buddhist artifacts, and stunning mountain views.

name: Radhanagar Beach
description: Pristine white sand beach with turquoise waters. Voted as Asia's best beach. Perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and watching stunning sunsets.

name: Cellular Jail
description: Historic prison used by British to exile freedom fighters. Now a national memorial with museum and light and sound show. Important historical site.

name: Elephant Beach
description: Beautiful beach perfect for snorkeling and water sports. Crystal clear waters with vibrant coral reefs and marine life. Accessible by boat.

name: Ross Island
description: Historic island with British colonial ruins. Beautiful architecture, deer, and peacocks. Perfect for history enthusiasts and nature lovers.

name: Neil Island
description: Serene island with beautiful beaches and natural rock formations. Less crowded, perfect for relaxation and water activities. Great for day trips.

name: Baratang Island
description: Famous for limestone caves and mud volcanoes. Unique natural formations accessible by boat and trek. Perfect for adventure and nature enthusiasts.

name: Chidiya Tapu
description: Beautiful sunset point with diverse bird species. Perfect for bird watching, photography, and peaceful evening walks. Also known as Bird Island.

name: Samudrika Marine Museum
description: Museum showcasing marine life, coral reefs, and Andaman history. Educational exhibits about local culture, geography, and biodiversity.

name: Mahatma Gandhi Marine National Park
description: Protected marine area with coral reefs and diverse marine life. Perfect for snorkeling, glass-bottom boat rides, and experiencing underwater beauty.

name: Corbyn's Cove Beach
description: Scenic beach near Port Blair with water sports facilities. Perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and enjoying coconut water. Less crowded than other beaches.

name: Laxman Jhula
description: Iconic suspension bridge over Ganges River. Beautiful views of the river and surrounding hills. Perfect for photography and experiencing Rishikesh's spiritual vibe.

name: Triveni Ghat
description: Sacred ghat on Ganges River famous for evening Ganga Aarti. Beautiful spiritual ceremony with lamps and prayers. Perfect for experiencing Rishikesh's culture.

name: Neelkanth Mahadev Temple
description: Sacred temple dedicated to Lord Shiva nestled in the hills. Beautiful architecture and spiritual atmosphere. Accessible via scenic drive through forests.

name: River Rafting
description: Thrilling white water rafting on Ganges River. Various difficulty levels from gentle to extreme rapids. Perfect for adventure enthusiasts and water sports lovers.

name: Beatles Ashram
description: Historic ashram where Beatles stayed in 1968. Features meditation caves, beautiful murals, and peaceful atmosphere. Perfect for history and music enthusiasts.

name: Ram Jhula
description: Another iconic suspension bridge over Ganges, similar to Laxman Jhula. Beautiful views and perfect for photography. Connects Swarg Ashram to Sivananda Nagar.

name: Parmarth Niketan
description: Largest ashram in Rishikesh offering yoga and meditation classes. Beautiful Ganga Aarti in the evening. Perfect for spiritual seekers and yoga enthusiasts.

name: Kunjapuri Temple
description: Hilltop temple offering stunning sunrise views of Himalayas. Accessible via trek or drive. Perfect for spiritual visits and photography.

name: Bungee Jumping
description: Thrilling bungee jumping experience from 83 meters height. India's highest bungee jumping point. Perfect for extreme adventure enthusiasts.

name: Market Road
description: Main shopping street with spiritual items, yoga accessories, and local handicrafts. Perfect for buying souvenirs, books, and traditional items.

name: Shaniwar Wada
description: Historic fortification and palace of Peshwas. Beautiful architecture with impressive gates and foundations. Sound and light show in the evening.

name: Aga Khan Palace
description: Historic palace where Mahatma Gandhi was imprisoned. Beautiful architecture, Gandhi museum, and serene gardens. Important historical and spiritual site.

name: Raja Dinkar Kelkar Museum
description: Private museum with extensive collection of Indian artifacts, art, and antiques. Beautiful displays of traditional Indian culture and craftsmanship.

name: Sinhagad Fort
description: Historic hill fort with panoramic views of Pune. Famous for its role in Maratha history. Perfect for trekking, history enthusiasts, and photography.

name: Dagdusheth Halwai Ganpati Temple
description: Famous temple dedicated to Lord Ganesha. Beautiful architecture and spiritual atmosphere. Especially crowded during Ganesh Chaturthi festival.

name: Koregaon Park
description: Trendy neighborhood with cafes, restaurants, and shopping. Perfect for dining, nightlife, and experiencing Pune's modern culture.

name: Pataleshwar Cave Temple
description: Ancient rock-cut cave temple dedicated to Lord Shiva. Carved from single basalt rock, dating back to 8th century. Perfect for history and spirituality.

name: Osho Ashram
description: Famous meditation and spiritual center. Beautiful gardens, meditation halls, and peaceful atmosphere. Requires advance booking for visits.

name: Tulsi Baug Market
description: Traditional market selling everything from clothes to electronics. Perfect for shopping, street food, and experiencing Pune's vibrant market culture.

name: Parvati Hill
description: Historic hill with temples and panoramic views of Pune. Perfect for morning walks, photography, and spiritual visits. Beautiful sunset views.

name: Mysore Palace
description: Magnificent royal palace showcasing Indo-Saracenic architecture. Beautiful interiors, artifacts, and illuminated at night. One of India's most visited palaces.

name: Chamundi Hill
description: Sacred hill with Chamundeshwari Temple and panoramic views of Mysore. Large Nandi statue and beautiful architecture. Perfect for spiritual visits and photography.

name: Brindavan Gardens
description: Beautiful terraced gardens with musical fountain show. Perfect for evening walks, photography, and family outings. Especially beautiful during fountain show.

name: Devaraja Market
description: Vibrant traditional market selling spices, flowers, fruits, and local products. Perfect for buying souvenirs, experiencing local culture, and photography.

name: St. Philomena's Church
description: Beautiful neo-Gothic church with impressive architecture. One of the tallest churches in Asia. Perfect for spiritual visits and photography.

name: Mysore Zoo
description: One of India's oldest and best-maintained zoos. Houses diverse wildlife including elephants, tigers, and exotic birds. Perfect for family visits.

name: Jaganmohan Palace
description: Historic palace converted into art gallery. Houses extensive collection of paintings, artifacts, and royal memorabilia. Perfect for art and history enthusiasts.

name: Sandalwood Oil Factory
description: Government factory producing sandalwood oil and products. Guided tours available. Perfect for buying authentic sandalwood products and learning about the process.

name: Karanji Lake
description: Beautiful lake with boating facilities and bird sanctuary. Perfect for peaceful walks, bird watching, and family outings. Scenic views and natural beauty.

name: Railway Museum
description: Museum showcasing vintage locomotives and railway history. Perfect for railway enthusiasts and families. Interactive exhibits and outdoor displays.

name: The Ridge
description: Famous promenade with panoramic views of surrounding hills. Perfect for walks, photography, and enjoying Shimla's scenic beauty. Iconic landmark of Shimla.

name: Christ Church
description: Beautiful neo-Gothic church on The Ridge. Second oldest church in North India. Beautiful stained glass windows and peaceful atmosphere.

name: Kalka-Shimla Toy Train
description: UNESCO World Heritage narrow-gauge railway. Scenic journey through mountains, tunnels, and bridges. Nostalgic experience with breathtaking views.

name: Jakhoo Temple
description: Ancient temple dedicated to Lord Hanuman perched on Jakhoo Hill. Giant Hanuman statue and panoramic views of Shimla. Accessible via trek or ropeway.

name: Mall Road
description: Main shopping street with local handicrafts, woolen items, and souvenirs. Perfect for buying traditional Himachali items and enjoying local food.

name: Kufri
description: Picturesque hill station near Shimla. Perfect for snow activities, horse riding, and scenic views. Popular destination for day trips from Shimla.

name: Lakkar Bazaar
description: Famous market selling wooden handicrafts, souvenirs, and local items. Perfect for buying traditional Himachali wooden artifacts and gifts.

name: Indian Institute of Advanced Study
description: Historic Viceregal Lodge, now a research institute. Beautiful colonial architecture and gardens. Guided tours available showcasing British era history.

name: Chadwick Falls
description: Beautiful waterfall surrounded by lush greenery. Accessible via short trek. Perfect for nature lovers, photography, and peaceful relaxation.

name: Himalayan Bird Park
description: Small bird park with diverse Himalayan bird species. Perfect for bird watching, photography, and family visits. Peaceful setting with mountain views.

name: Kaziranga National Park
description: UNESCO World Heritage Site famous for one-horned rhinoceros. Diverse wildlife including tigers, elephants, and exotic birds. Safari rides available.

name: Kamakhya Temple
description: Famous temple dedicated to Goddess Kamakhya. One of the most important Shakti Peethas. Beautiful architecture and spiritual atmosphere.

name: Majuli Island
description: World's largest river island with Vaishnavite monasteries. Unique culture, traditional crafts, and serene landscapes. Perfect for cultural immersion.

name: Sivasagar
description: Historic town with ancient Ahom dynasty monuments. Beautiful temples, tanks, and palaces. Perfect for history enthusiasts and photography.

name: Tea Gardens
description: Lush tea plantations offering guided tours and tea tasting. Learn about Assam tea cultivation and enjoy scenic views of rolling hills.

name: Umananda Temple
description: Temple on Peacock Island in Brahmaputra River. Accessible by boat, offers beautiful river views and spiritual atmosphere.

name: Fancy Bazaar
description: Traditional market selling Assamese silk, handicrafts, and local products. Perfect for buying authentic Assamese items and souvenirs.

name: Brahmaputra River Cruise
description: Scenic river cruises on Brahmaputra River. Beautiful sunsets, riverside views, and peaceful atmosphere. Perfect for relaxation and photography.

name: Assam State Museum
description: Museum showcasing Assamese history, culture, and artifacts. Extensive collection of sculptures, manuscripts, and traditional items.

name: Pobitora Wildlife Sanctuary
description: Wildlife sanctuary with high density of one-horned rhinoceros. Jeep safaris available. Perfect for wildlife enthusiasts and photography.

name: Bangalore Palace
description: Magnificent palace with Tudor-style architecture. Beautiful interiors, gardens, and royal artifacts. Perfect for history and architecture enthusiasts.

name: Lalbagh Botanical Garden
description: Famous botanical garden with diverse flora, glasshouse, and beautiful landscapes. Perfect for morning walks, photography, and nature lovers.

name: Cubbon Park
description: Large public park in the heart of Bangalore. Perfect for jogging, walking, and peaceful relaxation. Beautiful trees and well-maintained paths.

name: Tipu Sultan's Summer Palace
description: Historic palace with beautiful architecture and artifacts. Showcases Tipu Sultan's life and history. Perfect for history enthusiasts.

name: Commercial Street
description: Famous shopping street with trendy boutiques, street vendors, and restaurants. Perfect for buying clothes, accessories, and souvenirs.

name: ISKCON Temple
description: Beautiful temple dedicated to Lord Krishna. Modern architecture, spiritual atmosphere, and cultural programs. Perfect for spiritual visits.

name: Nandi Hills
description: Scenic hill station perfect for sunrise views and trekking. Beautiful landscapes, ancient temples, and peaceful atmosphere. Popular weekend destination.

name: UB City Mall
description: Luxury shopping mall with international brands, fine dining, and entertainment. Perfect for upscale shopping and dining experiences.

name: Bannerghatta National Park
description: National park with zoo, safari, and butterfly park. Perfect for wildlife enthusiasts and family visits. Diverse flora and fauna.

name: KR Market
description: Traditional market selling fresh flowers, fruits, vegetables, and local products. Perfect for experiencing local culture and buying souvenirs.

name: Taj Mahal
description: Iconic white marble mausoleum, one of the Seven Wonders of the World. UNESCO World Heritage Site. Perfect for photography, especially at sunrise.

name: Agra Fort
description: UNESCO World Heritage Site, massive red sandstone fort. Beautiful Mughal architecture, palaces, and gardens. Perfect for history enthusiasts.

name: Fatehpur Sikri
description: UNESCO World Heritage Site, abandoned Mughal city. Beautiful architecture, palaces, and mosques. Perfect for history and architecture enthusiasts.

name: Itmad-ud-Daulah's Tomb
description: Beautiful marble tomb often called Baby Taj. Intricate carvings and inlay work. Inspiration for Taj Mahal, perfect for photography.

name: Mehtab Bagh
description: Beautiful gardens across Yamuna River offering stunning views of Taj Mahal. Perfect for sunset views and photography. Less crowded alternative.

name: Kinari Bazaar
description: Traditional market near Taj Mahal selling handicrafts, marble items, and souvenirs. Perfect for buying authentic Agra items and gifts.

name: Jama Masjid
description: Historic mosque built by Shah Jahan. Beautiful architecture and spiritual atmosphere. Perfect for spiritual visits and photography.

name: Sikandra
description: Tomb of Akbar the Great with beautiful architecture and gardens. Perfect for history enthusiasts and peaceful walks.

name: Chini ka Rauza
description: Historic tomb with beautiful Persian-style architecture and tile work. Less visited, perfect for peaceful exploration and photography.

name: Marble Inlay Workshop
description: Workshops showcasing traditional marble inlay work. Learn about the craft, watch artisans at work, and buy authentic marble items.

name: Hawa Mahal
description: Iconic five-story palace with unique honeycomb architecture. Beautiful facade with 953 windows. Perfect for photography and history enthusiasts.

name: City Palace
description: Magnificent palace complex showcasing Rajasthani and Mughal architecture. Beautiful courtyards, museums, and royal artifacts. Perfect for history lovers.

name: Amber Fort
description: Magnificent hilltop fort with beautiful architecture and panoramic views. Elephant rides available. Perfect for history, photography, and scenic views.

name: Jantar Mantar
description: UNESCO World Heritage Site with collection of astronomical instruments. Largest stone sundial in the world. Perfect for science and history enthusiasts.

name: Nahargarh Fort
description: Hilltop fort offering panoramic views of Jaipur. Perfect for sunset views, photography, and peaceful walks. Less crowded than other forts.

name: Johari Bazaar
description: Famous jewelry market selling traditional Rajasthani jewelry, gemstones, and handicrafts. Perfect for buying authentic Jaipur items and souvenirs.

name: Birla Mandir
description: Beautiful white marble temple dedicated to Lord Vishnu and Goddess Lakshmi. Modern architecture and peaceful atmosphere. Perfect for spiritual visits.

name: Albert Hall Museum
description: Oldest museum in Rajasthan with extensive collection of artifacts, paintings, and sculptures. Beautiful Indo-Saracenic architecture.

name: Chokhi Dhani
description: Ethnic village resort showcasing Rajasthani culture. Traditional food, folk performances, and cultural activities. Perfect for experiencing local culture.

name: Bapu Bazaar
description: Traditional market selling textiles, handicrafts, and souvenirs. Perfect for buying Rajasthani items like puppets, textiles, and traditional clothes.

name: Kashi Vishwanath Temple
description: One of the most sacred temples dedicated to Lord Shiva. Spiritual atmosphere and beautiful architecture. Perfect for spiritual visits and prayers.

name: Ganga Aarti
description: Beautiful evening prayer ceremony on Ganges River. Spectacular display of lamps, prayers, and music. Perfect for spiritual experience and photography.

name: Ghats of Varanasi
description: Famous riverfront steps along Ganges. Perfect for boat rides, morning walks, and experiencing Varanasi's spiritual culture. Beautiful sunrise views.

name: Sarnath
description: Buddhist pilgrimage site where Buddha gave his first sermon. Ancient stupas, monasteries, and museum. Perfect for history and spirituality.

name: Boat Ride on Ganges
description: Scenic boat rides on Ganges River during sunrise or sunset. Beautiful views of ghats, temples, and spiritual atmosphere. Perfect for photography.

name: Vishwanath Gali
description: Narrow lanes leading to Kashi Vishwanath Temple. Traditional shops selling religious items, sweets, and souvenirs. Perfect for experiencing old Varanasi.

name: Ramnagar Fort
description: Historic fort on the banks of Ganges. Museum with royal artifacts and vintage cars. Beautiful architecture and river views.

name: Banaras Hindu University
description: Famous university with beautiful campus, temples, and museums. Perfect for peaceful walks and experiencing academic atmosphere.

name: Manikarnika Ghat
description: Famous cremation ghat on Ganges. Important spiritual site with deep cultural significance. Respectful observation of rituals and traditions.

name: Thateri Bazaar
description: Traditional market selling Banarasi silk, handicrafts, and religious items. Perfect for buying authentic Varanasi items and souvenirs.

name: Golden Temple
description: Most sacred Sikh shrine, Harmandir Sahib. Beautiful golden architecture, serene atmosphere, and community kitchen. Perfect for spiritual visits.

name: Wagah Border
description: Famous border ceremony between India and Pakistan. Patriotic flag lowering ceremony with impressive performances. Perfect for experiencing national pride.

name: Jallianwala Bagh
description: Historic memorial park commemorating the 1919 massacre. Important historical site with museum and memorial. Perfect for history enthusiasts.

name: Partition Museum
description: Museum documenting the partition of India. Emotional exhibits, stories, and artifacts. Important historical and educational site.

name: Gobindgarh Fort
description: Historic fort with museums, cultural shows, and exhibitions. Perfect for history enthusiasts and family visits. Beautiful architecture and gardens.

name: Hall Bazaar
description: Traditional market near Golden Temple selling religious items, handicrafts, and souvenirs. Perfect for buying authentic Amritsar items and gifts.

name: Durgiana Temple
description: Beautiful Hindu temple resembling Golden Temple architecture. Dedicated to Goddess Durga. Peaceful atmosphere and beautiful architecture.

name: Maharaja Ranjit Singh Museum
description: Museum showcasing artifacts, paintings, and history of Maharaja Ranjit Singh. Beautiful collection of Sikh heritage and royal memorabilia.

name: Guru ka Langar
description: Community kitchen at Golden Temple serving free meals to thousands daily. Experience Sikh hospitality and community service. Open to all visitors.

name: Katras Bazaar
description: Traditional market selling Phulkari embroidery, handicrafts, and local products. Perfect for buying authentic Punjabi items and souvenirs.
